data.title: SERGE GAINSBOURG : Et Le Cinema
data.meta_description: An original compilation featuring legendary tracks from Serge Gainsbourg's early productions for the cinema. Tracks A1-A3 were recorded in December 1959 and are taken from the 1960 EP film score for L'eau À La Bouche. Tracks A4-A5 were recorded in December 1959 and are taken from the 1960 EP film score for Les Loups Dans La Bergerie. Track A6 was recorded in March and April 1963 and is taken from the 1963 LP N° 8 by Juliette Gréco. Tracks A7-B4 were recorded at the end of 1962 and are taken from the 1963 EP film score for Strip-Tease. Tracks B5-B8 were recorded in March 1963 and are taken from the 1964 EP film score for Comment Trouvez-Vous Ma Soeur ?.

Track A6 was recorded in March and April 1963 and is taken from the 1963 LP N° 8 by Juliette Gréco. Tracks A7-B4 were recorded at the end of 1962 and are taken from the 1963 EP film score for Strip-Tease. Tracks B5-B8 were recorded in March 1963 and are taken from the 1964 EP film score for Comment Trouvez-Vous Ma Soeur ?.
